abstract: United Nations appoints Filippo Grandi to head organization's refugee agency amid worst migrant crisis in recent memory.
lead_paragraph: Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon said he was nominating the candidate, Filippo Grandi, to assume the post starting in 2016.

headline.main: Veteran Italian Diplomat at U.N. to Get Top Refugee Post
headline.print_headline: Italian U.N. Official Named to Refugee Post

snippet: Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon said he was nominating the candidate, Filippo Grandi, to assume the post starting in 2016.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
